# hasSpaceAvailable

**Instance Property**

A boolean value that indicates whether the receiver can be written to.

## Declaration

```swift
var hasSpaceAvailable: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the receiver can be written to or if a write must be attempted in order to determine if space is available, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] otherwise.

## Using Streams

- **write(_:maxLength:)**: Writes the contents of a provided data buffer to the receiver.
